name: Rocketer
description:
A 4 day project developed for my Graduate Program application. Using only Unity Standard Assets and designed for mobile.

The task was to develop a side-scrolling endless runner:

Functional Requirements:
● A player character that can:
○ Jump
○ Interact with obstacles
○ Collect items
● A side-scrolling environment
○ Platforms
○ Ground to run on
○ Endless
● Obstacles that trigger an end state
● Items that the player can pick up
● A scoring system
● An end state
● Functionality that can be built directly to mobile
